artefact.alternative_title: General movement licence for transporting livestock in England
artefact.overview: Find out what licences you need to transport cattle, deer, goats, pigs or sheep in England.
artefact.licence_short_description: Authorisation to transport livestock in England.
artefact.licence_overview:
$!Get a general movement licence from the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra) if you want to move livestock in England.$!

You need a general movement licence to move cattle, deer, goats, pigs or sheep from one holding or premises to another. 

You need a separate licence for each species you want to move.

##Other documents
As well as the general movement licence, you'll also need:

+ for deer, sheep and goats - completed animal movement licence (AML) documents from [your local council](http://local.direct.gov.uk/LDGRedirect/index.jsp?mode=1.1 "Find your local authority"){:rel="external"}

+ for pigs - a [haulier summary](http://www.eaml2.org.uk/ami/home.eb "eAML2"){:rel="external"} (called an 'eAML2')

+ for cattle - cattle passports from the [British Cattle Movement Service (BCMS),](https://secure.services.defra.gov.uk/wps/portal/ctso "British Cattle Movement Service"){:rel="external"} and you must tell the BCMS within 3 days of the movement taking place

##Restrictions
^Once you have moved animals, you must generally not move them again for at least 6 days (20 days for pigs).^

Your licence might include other restrictions and conditions.

##How to apply
Download the forms from the Defra website:

+ [cattle](http://www.defra.gov.uk/food-farm/animals/movements/cattle/ "Cattle identification and movement"){:rel="external"}
+ [sheep](http://www.defra.gov.uk/food-farm/animals/movements/sheep/ "Sheep identification and movement"){:rel="external"}
+ [pigs](http://www.defra.gov.uk/food-farm/animals/movements/pigs/ "Pig identification and movement"){:rel="external"}
+ [goats](http://www.defra.gov.uk/food-farm/animals/movements/goats/ "Goat identification and movement"){:rel="external"}
+ [deer and other animals](http://www.defra.gov.uk/food-farm/animals/movements/other-animals/ "Deer and other animals"){:rel="external"}

There are no fees for applying for this licence.


##Fines and penalties

You can lose your licence and be prosecuted if you don't follow animal movement rules.

*[Defra]: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
*[BCMS]: British Cattle Movement Service
